content.text:
How does a designer resolve a design?<image 1>

A. By sketching multiple design ideas
B. By conducting user testing
C. By creating a presentation and developing the design into a publishable format that addresses all evaluation criteria
D. By refining typography and layout

C. By creating a presentation and developing the design into a publishable format that addresses all evaluation criteria

A designer would resolve a design by creating a presentation and developing the design into a publishable format that addresses all evaluation criteria. This includes sketching multiple design ideas, conducting user testing, refining typography and layout, and ensuring the design meets all evaluation criteria.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
